job_description:
• Minimum QualificationsYou have a Bachelors Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, or equivalent experience.
• You have very strong C++, C and embedded software skills.
• You have excellent analytical, problem-solving skills, programming and debugging skills.

• Minimum QualificationsMinimum requirement of BS + 3 years of relevant industry experienceHands-on experience in at least one general-purpose programming language (Python, JavaScript, or Go)Experience with frontend web development (React and modern JavaScript frameworks)Experience with SQL and NoSQL databasesExperience with a Linux environmentUnderstanding of RESTful API design and authentication techniques (Eg.

• Minimum QualificationsYou possess strong software development and design skills.
• You have strong object-oriented programming skills in Swift or Objective-C.
• You have strong communication, collaboration, and interpersonal skills.
• You are self-directed and can solve problems independently.

• Experience and certifications preferred.
